article_title: Obama Proposes To Fix The Cadillac Tax

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: Like most of the budget, the proposal probably won’t go anywhere in the current Congress, but it’s a reasonable template for revising the law after the next president is elected. Reining in this ineffective, distortionary tax policy should be a priority for both parties.
og.title: Obama Proposes To Fix The Cadillac Tax
